data.enText: a chemical element. Sulphur is a pale yellow substance that produces a strong unpleasant smell when it burns and is used in medicine and industry.

tr: an abundant tasteless odorless multivalent nonmetallic element
occurs in many sulphide and sulphate minerals and even in native form (especially in volcanic regions)
treat with sulphur in order to preserve

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 sulfur

value.def: Sulphur is a yellow chemical which has a strong smell.

example.tran: 空气中散发着硫黄味儿。

example.ex: ...measures to reduce emissions of sulphur dioxide.
